Here we'll cover building a mesh from some spatial data.
We'll first load in some spatial data to create the mesh.

```{r}
sp_data <- fdmr::load_tutorial_data(filename = "spatial_data.rds")
```

Let's start the mesh builder app and pass it the spatial data we just loaded.

```{r}
loc_data = sp_data@data[, c("LONG", "LAT")]
```

```{r}
fdmr::mesh_builder(location_data=loc_data)
```
